title: No Worlds 2017 Missions at all
body:
Well as said in the title i dont get Missions at all ,i didnt do any and i didnt get any.
I dont know if this might have to do with a bug that i have, because every time i start up lol i get "Trying to Reconnect" and i have to wait 5 mins to play lol.{{summoner:14}} 
Maybe it has something to do with it.

I appreciate all the help i hopefully get.
-B3rko

replies.body: Strange indeed. I'm seeing your account already has some missions completed and you're making progress through the Worlds Missions. Shoot me a screenshot of your client if you're still not seeing them so I can see what's going wrong on your end.
